gov.sandia.cognition.graph.inference

Interface EnergyFunctionSolver<LabelType>

  • Type Parameters:
    LabelType - The type for node's possible labels. Only used as an enumeration.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SumProductBeliefPropagation, SumProductDirectedPropagation, SumProductInferencingAlgorithm

    public interface EnergyFunctionSolver<LabelType>
    Interface for any belief propagation implementation.
    Author:
    tong

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getBelief(int i, int label)
      Gets the belief for node i with the specified label.
      void init(EnergyFunction<LabelType> f)
      Initializes internal state and stores the energy function for future solutions.
      boolean solve()
      Solves for the energy function passed in during initialize, e.g., compute the beliefs.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(EnergyFunction<LabelType> f)
        Initializes internal state and stores the energy function for future solutions. The energy function can still change its unary and pairwise method outputs after this is called, but the number of nodes, edges, etc. must stay constant.
        Parameters:
        f - The energy function to initialize against

      • solve

        boolean solve()
        Solves for the energy function passed in during initialize, e.g., compute the beliefs.
        Returns:
        true if converged, false otherwise.

      • getBelief

        double getBelief(int i,
                 int label)
        Gets the belief for node i with the specified label. This can only be called after solve().
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the node whose belief associated with the input label is wanted
        label - The label for the node whose belief is desired
        Returns:
        The belief for the input node/label pair
